text: Soni chisimu chene twajiguumbiile Jahannama majini gamajinji kwisa soni wandu (watakajinjileko), wanganyao akwete mitima nambo wangamanyilila najo, meso soni akwete nambo wangalolela nago, ni mawiwi gakwe akwete nambo wangapikanila nago, wanganyao ali chisawu inyama, gambakuti wanganyao ni wali wakusokonechela nnope (kumpunda inyama), wanganyao ni wali waakwaanjila (malamusi ga Allah)
